name: Balancer Boosted Aave USDC
public_notice: BB-A-USDC had recently migrated from their old contract to a new one , kindly refer to this post for more information.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
